name: PeriodicWave
description: PeriodicWave has no inputs or outputs; it is used to define custom oscillators when calling OscillatorNode.setPeriodicWave(). The PeriodicWave itself is created/returned by AudioContext.createPeriodicWave().

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'PeriodicWave' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
